p: For the SSR-enriched gDNA library approach, total gDNA from 8 A. artemisiifolia individuals was isolated using the DNeasy Plant Mini Kit (QIAGEN, Valencia, California, USA) and processed by GenoScreen, (Lille, France). A SSR enriched DNA library was obtained as described in [ 33]. Briefly, total DNA was mechanically fragmented and enriched for AG, AC, AAC, AAG, AGG, ACG, ACAT and ATCT repeat motifs. Enriched fragments were subsequently amplified. Amplicons were sequenced on a 454 GS FLX Titanium system (454 Life Sciences, Branford, USA) following manufacturerâ€™s protocols.
